context: Biopharmaceutical company evaluating major investment in genomics research for personalized medicine platform

request.purpose: Build comprehensive genomics research platform for drug discovery and personalized medicine development
request.justification: Genomics represents the future of medicine with potential to revolutionize drug development and patient outcomes

decision_process.outcome: Strong scientific foundation with clear path to clinical applications
Attractive market opportunity with $50B+ addressable market by 2030
Positive NPV with attractive risk-adjusted returns
Excellent strategic fit with existing capabilities and pipeline
Manageable risk profile with clear mitigation strategies

business_impact.projected_revenue: $2 billion in new product revenue over 10 years

outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Infrastructure deployment on track, 3 research partnerships established, regulatory pathway mapping completed
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: First genomic analysis platform operational, 2 drug discovery programs initiated, $50M in milestone payments received
outcome_tracking.actual_roi: Project tracking 18% ROI (vs projected 15%) with accelerated regulatory approvals

lessons_learned: Early regulatory engagement crucial for genomics research - investment in compliance team 40% higher than budgeted but essential for market access. Technology integration more complex than anticipated, requiring additional bioinformatics expertise.
